# Unnamed Journal (Level 3 Universalist)
## Overview
*This is a simple, unadorned spellbook. Notes on improving the efficiency of each spell crowd the margins, most of them hopelessly misguided.*

**Value** 265 gp

**Spells**

2nd—*[[Fox's Cunning (Spell)|fox’s cunning]]*, *[[Scorching Ray (Spell)|scorching ray]]* 

1st—*[[Alarm (Spell)|alarm]]*, *[[Feather Fall (Spell)|feather fall]]*, *[[Obscuring Mist (Spell)|obscuring mist]]*, *[[Mount (Spell)|mount]]*, *[[Shield (Spell)|shield]]*, *[[Shocking Grasp (Spell)|shocking grasp]]*, *[[Silent Image (Spell)|silent image]]*, *[[Sleep (Spell)|sleep]]* 

0—standard plus *jolt* 

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 121
